title: GAP Men's Straight Fit Denim Jeans
description: THE ORIGINAL STRAIGHT FIT: Cut straight through the hips and thighs, these jeans are made from rigid, non-stretch premium denim that gets better with every wear
CLASSIC DETAILS: Each pair features five-pocket styling, a button closure, and a heavy duty zipper fly
SIZES FOR ALL: Gap jeans are made for every body and are available in a wide range of fits, sizes, washes, and styles
BETTER DENIM FOR A BETTER PLANET: This pair of denim pants is part of our water conserving Washwell program dedicated to finding more responsible ways to creating the styles we all know and love
AMERICAN STYLE FOR ALL AGES: Gap champions a uniquely American sense of style with apparel that bridges the gaps between individuals, generations, and cultures

Modern American Optimism is in our DNA. Since 1969, we have acted as a force for good. Bridging the gaps between generations, backgrounds, and ideas through the honesty (and hope) of our eternal youthful energy.
